name: Tank Factory: Idle Miner Games
description:
The game logic of “Tank Factory” is that defeat the enemy with tanks, occupy more mines, earn money by mining and upgrade the tanks with money.

When you defeat the first enemy, you will occupy the first mines. Become an industrial tycoon by managing your mine and idle profit, and earn enough money to upgrade your tank. Then you can start wars in another area where is rich in mineral resources.

As for mining management, have you ever wondered how to be an effective mine manager?
Expand your millionaire mining empire and give your productivity a boost with specialized miner managers who will automate the workflow of your mine! Take on this challenge and discover the best strategy to invest in and earn as much cash as possible - online and offline!

Tank Factory is a simulation game that mixes tank wars with mining management to gain profit and become a famous millionaire. The aim of this miner strategy simulator is to build and optimize resources to gain as much productivity and idle benefits as possible. With the income you make from the mine, you will have to hire and pay managers and miners, upgrade your mines and mining buildings and equipment as well as optimize your workflow for the perfect timing of the whole mining and management process. Become a mine manager tycoon capitalist, build a millionaire empire, and earn a massive profit. Gain some revenue and invest now in this miner manager simulator until you become a rich tycoon!

FEATURES OF Tank Factory
- Automate your mining workflow to increase your idle income: No need to tap and tap like in an online casual clicker simulator!
- Get idle cash and earn money & gold: Continue conducting business even when you are offline!
- Profit from a smart money investment or two to boost your economy and win lots of rewards!
- Hire managers to increase your miners’ motivation!
- Every manager has a special tycoon booster: Increase worker productivity!
- Prestige feature and different levels: Build up your billionaire empire simulation!
- Manage many mines like a real boss: Become a mining tycoon magnate by managing this mine business simulator!
- Mine for more than 15 different resources: coal, gold, ruby, moonstone, amethyst, crystal, and jade!
- Collect masses of coal and gold in this money and income management simulator!
- No Internet connection needed: Produce wealth online or offline!

Wait for no further and start playing this idle game and keep upgrading your super tanks, eventually, occupy the entire map and become a tycoon billionaire.

Got any problems or suggestions?
